greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{k=0..n} (prime(k+1)*(binomial(n,k) mod 2).
comment: A123098 is a much better version of this sequence.
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..510
program: return reduce(mul,(0 if ~n & k else prime(k+1) for k in range(n+1))) # _Chai Wah Wu_, Feb 09 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2015
